About this Documentation

This document is provided to OEMs, game developers, and NVIDIA technology partners.

Navigating the Documentation

This document describes the interface constants, structure definitions, and function prototypes for NvAPI. It is presented as an on-line help file. This format provides hypertext linking between related topics.

The Contents tab lets you access information as follows:

  • NVIDIA NVAPI - Main Page contains supplemental documentation pages.
  • Modules organizes the APIs by groups to help you easily locate a particular API.
  • Data Structures and Files provide a straightforward listing of functions, structures, and data types within the header file.
  • NVIDIA NVAPI contains related documentation pages.

About the Lite Header Files

This NVAPI package includes ‘lite’ headers, which include protoypes of the most useful functions for a specific feature.

  • Direct3D (nvapi_lite_d3dext.h)
  • SLI (nvapi_lite_sli.h)
  • Stereoscopic 3D (nvapi_lite_stereo.h)
  • Surround (nvapi_lite_surround.h)
